title: PEP (Personalized Education Program)
description: The Personalized Education Program (PEP) Scholarship provides Florida families with funds to customize their child's education through a combination of approved educational products and services. For families of children with autism, PEP funds can be used for specialized therapies, curriculum materials, educational technology, tutoring services, and enrollment in part-time private school classes. This flexible scholarship model allows parents to design an educational plan tailored to their child's unique needs. Students must be enrolled in public school for the previous year or be entering kindergarten to be eligible.
